full_output.summary: Passionate Full Stack Developer with expertise in Flutter and MERN stack. Experienced in designing and implementing user-friendly mobile and web applications. Skilled in UI/UX design and Agile methodologies, seeking a challenging role to contribute to innovative projects.

projects.name: YourWay
projects.description: It's a social networking platform designed for university students to share posts about their college experiences and related activities.

experiences.description: Implemented user-friendly app layouts from Figma designs, maintaining design integrity. Collaborated with a team, optimized state management, reduced crashes by 40%, and enhanced user experience. Led key application screens development, showcasing problem-solving skills and leadership. Gained hands-on experience with Agile development process.

Developed authentication screens and main screens for a product-based mobile application, ensuring a secure and efficient user experience. Integrated Firebase for user authentication, contributing to the app's seamless functionality and security.
